Title: Provides that any charges assessed by a credit card company for late payment shall not exceed five percent of the unpaid balance of any bill or twenty dollars
Summary: Provides that any charges assessed by a credit card company for late payment shall not exceed five percent of the unpaid balance of any bill, including any interest thereon, or twenty dollars, whichever amount is less.
LawCode: Add ยง518-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to credit card late charges
